// <autogenerated/>
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Threading.Tasks;
using Microsoft.Azure.Functions.Worker;
using NServiceBus;

public class FunctionEndpointTrigger
{
    IFunctionEndpoint endpoint;

        public FunctionEndpointTrigger(IFunctionEndpoint endpoint)
        {
            this.endpoint = endpoint;
        }


        [Function("trigger")]
        public async Task Run(
            [ServiceBusTrigger("endpoint")] byte[] messageBody,
            string messageId,
            int deliveryCount,
            string replyTo,
            string correlationId,
            FunctionContext context)
        {
            await endpoint.Process(messageBody, messageId, deliveryCount, replyTo, correlationId, context);
        }
}
